verses.text: And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* with him, and the \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, and the \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and a \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* for the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, and a \w basket|strong="H5536"\w* of unleavened \w bread|strong="H4682"\w*;

And \w gather|strong="H6950"\w* thou all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w together|strong="H6950"\w* unto the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* him; and the \w assembly|strong="H5712"\w* was gathered \w together|strong="H6950"\w* unto the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, This \add is\add* the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* to be \w done|strong="H6213"\w*.
And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* them with \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.

And he \w put|strong="H5414"\w* upon him the \w coat|strong="H3801"\w*, and \w girded|strong="H2296"\w* him with the \w girdle|strong="H0073"\w*, and \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* him with the \w robe|strong="H4598"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w* upon him, and he \w girded|strong="H2296"\w* him with the curious \w girdle|strong="H2805"\w* of the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*, and \w bound|strong="H0640"\w* \add it\add* unto him therewith.

And he \w put|strong="H7760"\w* the \w breastplate|strong="H2833"\w* upon him: also he \w put|strong="H5414"\w* in the \w breastplate|strong="H2833"\w* the \w Urim|strong="H0224"\w* and the \w Thummim|strong="H8550"\w*.

And he \w put|strong="H7760"\w* the \w mitre|strong="H4701"\w* upon his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*; also upon the \w mitre|strong="H4701"\w*, \add even\add* upon his \w forefront|strong="H6440"\w*, did he \w put|strong="H7760"\w* the \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w plate|strong="H6731"\w*, the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w crown|strong="H5145"\w*; as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* the \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* and all that \add was\add* therein, and \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* them.

And he \w sprinkled|strong="H5137"\w* thereof upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w*, and \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* and all his \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*, both the \w laver|strong="H3595"\w* and his \w foot|strong="H3653"\w*, to \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* them.

And he \w poured|strong="H3332"\w* of the \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* upon \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* him, to \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* him.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w put|strong="H3847"\w* \w coats|strong="H3801"\w* upon them, and \w girded|strong="H2296"\w* them with \w girdles|strong="H0073"\w*, and \w put|strong="H2280"\w* \w bonnets|strong="H4021"\w* upon them; as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.\f + \fr 8.13 \ft put bonnets: Heb. bound bonnets\f*

And he \w brought|strong="H5066"\w* the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* for the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*: and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w laid|strong="H5564"\w* their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* for the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*.

And he \w slew|strong="H7819"\w* \add it;\add* and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* upon the \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* with his \w finger|strong="H0676"\w*, and \w purified|strong="H2398"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and \w poured|strong="H3332"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* at the \w bottom|strong="H3247"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* it, to make \w reconciliation|strong="H3722"\w* upon it.

And he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* all the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* that \add was\add* upon the \w inwards|strong="H7130"\w*, and the \w caul|strong="H3508"\w* \add above\add* the \w liver|strong="H3516"\w*, and the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w kidneys|strong="H3629"\w*, and their \w fat|strong="H2459"\w*, and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w burned|strong="H6999"\w* \add it\add* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

But the \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, and his \w hide|strong="H5785"\w*, his \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*, and his \w dung|strong="H6569"\w*, he \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w*; as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

¶ And he \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* for the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*: and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w laid|strong="H5564"\w* their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*.

And he \w killed|strong="H7819"\w* \add it;\add* and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w sprinkled|strong="H2236"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

And he \w cut|strong="H5408"\w* the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* into \w pieces|strong="H5409"\w*; and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w burnt|strong="H6999"\w* the \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and the \w pieces|strong="H5409"\w*, and the \w fat|strong="H6309"\w*.

And he \w washed|strong="H7364"\w* the \w inwards|strong="H7130"\w* and the \w legs|strong="H3767"\w* in \w water|strong="H4325"\w*; and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w burnt|strong="H6999"\w* the whole \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*: it \add was\add* a burnt \w sacrifice|strong="H5930"\w* for a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w*, \add and\add* an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

¶ And he \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* of \w consecration|strong="H4394"\w*: and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w laid|strong="H5564"\w* their \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* upon the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*.

And he \w slew|strong="H7819"\w* \add it;\add* and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of it, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add it\add* upon the \w tip|strong="H8571"\w* of \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*, and upon the \w thumb|strong="H0931"\w* of his \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and upon the great \w toe|strong="H0931"\w* of his \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*.

And he \w brought|strong="H7126"\w* \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* upon the \w tip|strong="H8571"\w* of their \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w ear|strong="H0241"\w*, and upon the \w thumbs|strong="H0931"\w* of their \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, and upon the great \w toes|strong="H0931"\w* of their \w right|strong="H3233"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*: and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w sprinkled|strong="H2236"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

And he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w*, and the \w rump|strong="H0451"\w*, and all the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* that \add was\add* upon the \w inwards|strong="H7130"\w*, and the \w caul|strong="H3508"\w* \add above\add* the \w liver|strong="H3516"\w*, and the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w kidneys|strong="H3629"\w*, and their \w fat|strong="H2459"\w*, and the \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H7785"\w*:

And out of the \w basket|strong="H5536"\w* of \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, that \add was\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w cake|strong="H2471"\w*, and a \w cake|strong="H2471"\w* of \w oiled|strong="H8081"\w* bread, and \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w wafer|strong="H7550"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \add them\add* on the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w*, and upon the \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w shoulder|strong="H7785"\w*:

And he \w put|strong="H5414"\w* all upon \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*, and upon his \w sons’|strong="H1121"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*, and \w waved|strong="H5130"\w* them \add for\add* a wave \w offering|strong="H8573"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* them from off their \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*, and \w burnt|strong="H6999"\w* \add them\add* on the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* upon the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*: they \add were\add* \w consecrations|strong="H4394"\w* for a \w sweet|strong="H5207"\w* \w savour|strong="H7381"\w*: it \add is\add* an offering made by \w fire|strong="H0801"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w breast|strong="H2373"\w*, and \w waved|strong="H5130"\w* it \add for\add* a wave \w offering|strong="H8573"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: \add for\add* of the \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* of \w consecration|strong="H4394"\w* it was \w Moses’|strong="H4872"\w* \w part|strong="H4490"\w*; as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* of the \w anointing|strong="H4888"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and of the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* which \add was\add* upon the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and \w sprinkled|strong="H5137"\w* \add it\add* upon \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \add and\add* upon his \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, and upon his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and upon his \w sons’|strong="H1121"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* with him; and \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \add and\add* his \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*, and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and his \w sons’|strong="H1121"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* with him.

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and to his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Boil|strong="H1310"\w* the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \add at\add* the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*: and there \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* it with the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* that \add is\add* in the \w basket|strong="H5536"\w* of \w consecrations|strong="H4394"\w*, as I \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* it.
And that which \w remaineth|strong="H3498"\w* of the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* and of the \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* shall ye \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

And ye shall not go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* \add in\add* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, until the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of your \w consecration|strong="H4394"\w* be at an \w end|strong="H4390"\w*: for \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shall he \w consecrate|strong="H4390"\w* you.

As he hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add so\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, to make an \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w* for you.

Therefore shall ye \w abide|strong="H3427"\w* \add at\add* the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w* \w day|strong="H3119"\w* and \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, and \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that ye \w die|strong="H4191"\w* not: for so I am \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

So \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* all \w things|strong="H1697"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.
